en: This tool analyse data in twitter based on different search parameters
This tool extracts the contextual information of a Youtube, Facebook or Instagram video
This tool fragment a video in the most important frames
This tool extracts the different cover images (thumnails) of a Youtube video
This tool retrieve tweets of a specific topic based on different parameters
This tool helps you to examine an image thoroughly
This tool retrieve the metadata info of an image
This tool inform you about the legal rights of a Youtube, Facebook or Instagram video
This tool help the process of detection of image manipulation
This tool uses different search engines to provide covid-19 information about a topic
This tool uses different search engines to provide information about a topic
This tool extract the text from an image
This tool allows you to create a gif animation from an original and a tampered image
The plugin needs your authorization to use cookies to enhance your user experience.
fr: Cette extension a besoin de votre autorisation pour utiliser des cookies afin d'améliorer votre expérience utilisateur.
es: El plugin necesita su autorización para utilizar cookies para mejorar su experiencia de usuario.
el: Η προσθήκη χρειάζεται την εξουσιοδότησή σας για τη χρήση cookie για τη βελτίωση της εμπειρίας του χρήστη σας.
